meanings.definition: Showing the greatest difference or contrast
meanings.sent1: The gappiest colors in the painting were red and blue.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was the gappiest compared to everyone else's.
meanings.sent3: The gappiest pair of socks he wore made him look like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The gappiest sky he had ever seen was during the sunset at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The gappiest smile on her face brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Having the widest or largest gap
meanings.sent1: The gappiest bridge in town was the one over the river.
meanings.sent2: The gappiest space between the shelves was just enough for the big book.
meanings.sent3: The gappiest teeth in the class belonged to the friendly giant.
meanings.sent4: The gappiest canyon he visited was breathtakingly deep.
meanings.sent5: The gappiest hole in the wall allowed the sunlight to stream in.

meanings.definition: Feeling the most joy or happiness
meanings.sent1: She had the gappiest expression when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The gappiest moment of his life was when he adopted a puppy.
meanings.sent3: The gappiest dance they did together made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The gappiest song she sang lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The gappiest memory he had was of playing in the park with friends.
